projects.name: Voice AI - Real-time Voice Assistant
projects.description: Architected a production-grade real-time voice assistant platform with sub-100ms interruption detection and low-latency audio pipeline. Built enterprise WebRTC-based system integrating Speech-to-Text, Voice Activity Detection, LLM processing, and Text-to-Speech in a seamless streaming architecture. Implemented advanced interruption handling with server-side VAD detection, sandboxed tool execution system, and persistent memory management. Developed modular pipeline architecture supporting both voice and chat sessions with visual canvas mode for rich UI interactions.
keyFeatures: Sub-100ms interruption detection with automatic TTS cancellation
Real-time audio pipeline: STT → VAD → LLM → TTS streaming
WebRTC-based low-latency audio streaming with datachannel messaging
Silero VAD v6 integration for robust speech detection
Sandboxed tool execution system with RestrictedPython
Persistent memory system with mem0ai integration
Visual canvas mode supporting multiple widget types
Modular architecture with independent pipeline components
Automatic context management and token limit handling

projects.name: macOS Intelligence MCP Framework
projects.description: Comprehensive macOS automation framework with 5 MCP servers: screen intelligence with native OCR, system control via AppleScript/RobotJS, power management with battery optimization, usage analytics with local SQLite, and Apple Shortcuts automation with natural language creation. Privacy-first with local data storage and Claude Desktop integration.
keyFeatures: 5 specialized MCP servers for different automation tasks
Native macOS OCR using Vision framework
Local SQLite analytics with privacy protection

projects.name: Reel2Trip (ixigo Hackweek '25)
projects.description: AI-powered travel itinerary generator that transforms Instagram Reels and YouTube Shorts into personalized travel plans. Simply share any travel reel with @planbyixigo on Instagram to get instant AI-generated itineraries. Features Instagram DM integration, smart destination identification, day-wise activity planning, flight recommendations, and chat-based customization with MILO bot. Built with Gemini/GPT-4 AI, reducing manual planning effort by 70% while seamlessly integrating into ixigo's flight booking ecosystem.

projects.name: ISRO X-Ray Burst Automation
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive web-based automated system for identifying solar X-ray bursts using ReactJS framework with advanced data segregation features. Led end-to-end product documentation, user journey design, and research orchestration. Organized curve data management through React hooks and JSON structures for seamless API integration. Achieved Silver Medal in Inter IIT mid-prep event, contributing to IIT Kanpur's 2nd position overall.
keyFeatures: Automated solar X-ray burst identification system
ReactJS framework with data segregation features
React hooks and JSON-based curve data organization
Seamless API integration for server communication
User journey design and research orchestration
Silver Medal in Inter IIT mid-prep event
Contributed to IIT Kanpur's 2nd position overall

projects.name: Journal Scrapper for Data Mining
projects.description: Automated system for fetching .ris/.bib files, extracting author details programmatically, and optimizing data retrieval processes. Proficiently conducted NER (Named Entity Recognition) to extract author entities and DOI URLs from scholarly articles. Used Scopus Cited By API to implement citation counts of input journals, enhancing tool functionality & data accuracy. Seamlessly connected Flask app and frontend through REST-based API calls.
keyFeatures: Named Entity Recognition for author extraction
DOI URL extraction from scholarly articles
Flask backend with REST API architecture

projects.name: Techkriti'23 - Web & App
projects.description: Revamped the entire tech architecture for IIT Kanpur's flagship fest while leading a 3-tier development team. Optimized the large MERN codebase through Webpack compression and performance enhancements. Successfully handled 350K+ monthly visits and 30K+ daily traffic, maintained 15K+ active users, and drove 30% YoY growth across 10+ corporate partnerships.
